Title: The First Day of the Rest of Your Life
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (based on the series of graphic novels by), Tony Moore (based on the series of graphic novels by), Charlie Adlard (based on the series of graphic novels by), Scott M. Gimple, Angela Kang, Matthew Negrete
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Lauren Cohan, Chandler Riggs
Plot: The stakes continue to grow higher as paths cross; The group enacts an intricate plan as the saviors arrive in Alexandria.
